title: Community Sliders
alt: Jude Bellingham wearing the number 5 shirt

content.html: Bellinghamania is fully underway, and not since Zizou was appointed manager in 2016 have I been this excited about Real Madrid's future. I needed something from video games to carry me on this wave, but I was quickly reminded of a landscape that couldnâ€™t be more horrifying:

items: eFootball plays well, but the online mode it promotes is awful and boring. Master League is still missing in action.
Football Manager is too dangerous of a drug. I should stay away.
FIFA FC 24 is... uh... well... not super terrible, I guess. At least when combined with this Christmas miracle.
